organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Dale Earnhardt Jr. was back in a racecar Friday. But the firestorm he created by announcing  he would leave Dale Earnhardt Inc. continued to blaze.
snippet: Dale Earnhardt Jr. was back in a racecar Friday. But the firestorm he created by announcing  he would leave Dale Earnhardt Inc. continued to blaze.
